channel.title: FroznFury | 317 | Necromancy | Dungeoneering | Economy
channel.description:
[center][url=http://froznfury.x10.bz/][img]http://froznfury.x10.bz/img/logo.png[/img][/url] [b][size=12pt]Links:[/size][/b] [url=http://www.froznfury.x10.bz/]Website[/url] [url=http://www.froznfury.x10.bz/forum/]Forum[/url] [url=http://www.froznfury.x10.bz/game.php]Webclient[/url] [url=http://www.froznfury.x10.bz/downloads/client.jar]Desktop Client[/url]
[b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k9xxx0l.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i6FAJ5D.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lXrW8Hm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pk3TXco.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pJMdOm5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/znmIAaN.png[/img]
The aura base is working, it's just that whenever I enable the aura effects to show, like the wings, the player names bug out and everyone does a weird animation. Also, when wear an aura, it isn't in the correct slot. This is not a sprite and buttons are not being clicked. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1Znw2cl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZNnSWDM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ghPomX0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JIOVpQV.png[/img]
[b][size=16pt]Features:[/size][/b]
Green = Done Orange = In progress Red = Not started
[b][size=12pt]Skills[/size]:[/b] [u][b]Working skills:[/b][/u]
[b]Combat[/b] Attack Defence Strength Constitution: Prayer: Magic: Summoning: Necromancy:
[b]Gathering[/b] Woodcutting: Fishing: Mining: Farming: Hunter:
[b]Support[/b] Thieving: Agility: Slayer: Dungeoneering:
[b]Artisan[/b] Runecrafting: Herblore: Crafting: Fletching: Smithing: Cooking Firemaking: Construction
[b]Custom skill: Necromancy[/b] Necromancy is a dark and evil version of the two skills, Summoning and Magic. Spells will be like summoning evil monsters, casting dark spells, and reviving the undead. This is the skill of the Devil. There are three tiers of spells: - Unembellished - Inception - Optimum The spells will require Mana to use them and your Mana will go up as you level the skill. You will gain 10 Mana points per level and will regenerate just like Constitution when you're not using a spell. The spells do not have a required level to use them, instead, you will unlock them with Necromancer tokens. You will gain a token for every four levels you gain. Making it so you have unlocked every spell by the time you have level 99 in the skill.
[b]Minigames:[/b] Barrows Pest Control Warriors' Guild Fight Caves & Pits A form of the Dominion Tower Bounty Hunter
Champion Scrolls Archaeology Team Wars - Team Restorations Vs. Team Destruction Free-For-All Pk Wars Fist of Guthix
Duel Tournaments
[b][size=12pt]Quests:[/size][/b] Cook's Assistant Doric's Quest Dragon Slayer Black Knight's Fortress Lunar Diplomacy Others to come
[b]In-Game Activities[/b] Squeal of Fortune Solomon's Store Loyalty shop for members Voting for rewards
[b]Other:[/b] Slayer point system like RuneScape. Resting Money pouch supports buying and selling to a store. Developers console Members gain 500 loyalty points every 45 minutes Having multiple worlds (Free and Members) Aura base Notes system Item searching in-game Quick chat Get skillcapes from actual skill master instead of the Wise old man Front and back loyalty titles
[/center]

item.title: FroznFury | 317 | Necromancy | Dungeoneering | Economy
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Togasa, post:19, topic:482002”]See lol this is why you can never be too sure about the servers on MoparForums…
This, at first glance, looked pretty damn good, unique, and not bad compared to the countless other shitty PI servers…
Yet after reading through all the updates you supposedly ‘added’, downloading the cache, and then ran the client…I found out it was a complete waste of time because the owner of this shit can’t even keep it online…
Sorry, thought I actually found a sufficient server to play until I realized how much bullshit that was lmao!

0/10 Do NOT Play[/quote]
You sure do like to talk a lot of shit, back your shit up and prove to me that you’re fucking worth something in this world.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

methodd:

Your server is advertised twice, from 2 different users, watch out you might get a 「warning」or 「ban」not sure. Delete the other topics details!

Go read the the stuff after the banner stuff. You’ll see that it isn’t a link that I have provided. He also mentions it contains an .exe file. Nothing that I have posted contains an .exe file. I didn’t tell him to copy and paste my thread to make another one. He’s just trying to get people to download a virus. I won’t get a warning or ban because I have already reported that thread.
His thread was deleted.

Edit: Started working on a Fist of Guthix base with rating highscores in-game. For more information about the skills and what not, go to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,603478.0.html
